alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:00PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING HAS BEEN REPLACED BY A WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain, sleet, or snow. Additional ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Additional sleet and snow accumulation of less than 1 inch. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon and South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads covered by ice and snow will make travel difficult. Although precipitation is generally decreasing, tree limbs may still come down, potentially leading to additional power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional power outages may still occur. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; South Willamette Valley
